#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

long long Amicable(int N)
{
	int i=1;
	long long sum=0;
	
	while(i<N)
	{
		if(N%i == 0)
		{
			sum+=i;
		}
		i++;
	}
	
	return sum;
}

int main(void)
{
	int T, N;
	long long P1, P2;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		
		P1=Amicable(N);
		
		P2=Amicable(P1);
		
		if(P2==N)
		{
			printf("Yes, amicable with %lld\n",P1);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("No\n");
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
